messages.subject: Anyone near St Louis?
messages.msgSnippet: Folks, I m looking for anyone in the St Louis area who might be able to help out a fellow I know with a blade he owns. Please reply to me off list if anyone
messages.messageBody:
Folks,

I'm looking for anyone in the St Louis area who might
be able to help out a fellow I know with a blade he
owns. Please reply to me off list if anyone would be
interested in helping out. Thanks

Bob R

=====
Check out "Cowboy" Bob's Books & Things at:
http://asia.geocities.com/gentleman9/index.htm
